title: Nusa Dua Beach Leisure (Half-day)
overview: Relax at Bali's pristine white-sand beach, perfect for swimming and water sports.

stops.description: Arrive, swim in calm waters, or sunbathe on the sand.
Enjoy a snack or cold drink at a café.

title: Nusa Dua Family Day (Full-day)
overview: A full day of water sports, swimming, and relaxation at Nusa Dua Beach.

stops.description: Try water sports like banana boat or parasailing.
Relax, swim, or walk along the beach promenade.
